key_points: Alena Knauss speaks out after her husband, Army Staff Sgt. Ryan C. Knauss, was killed in the Kabul airport attack.
Staff Sgt. Ryan C. Knauss was assigned to the 8th Psychological Operations Group at Fort Bragg.
Knauss joined the Army in 2016, the same year he and Alena got married.
Alena's last message to her husband was expressing her love and asking for a response when he could.
Ryan C. Knauss was among 13 service members who died in Kabul during an evacuation mission.
Alena struggles with the loss but feels gratitude for the time they shared.
She describes her late husband as a charismatic person who loved to help others.
Ryan C. Knauss was dedicated to his field and would have repeated his actions knowing the outcome, according to Alena.
The article provides a personal insight into the impact of the Kabul airport attack on the families of the service members.
spokespersons: Alena Knauss (Widow of Army Staff Sgt. Ryan C. Knauss)
